mapper.sql: n_id as id, nb_id as notebookId, n_title as title, n_body as body, n_modify_time as modifyTime
mapper.insert: insert into cn_note(n_id, nb_id, n_title, n_modify_time ) values(#{id},#{notebookId}, #{title},#{modifyTime})
mapper.update: update cn_note set n_title = #{title}, n_body = #{body}, n_modify_time = #{modifyTime} where n_id = #{id}
update cn_note set nb_id = #{notebookId} where n_id = #{id}
